title: RIOT WTF
body: RIOT I WAS IN PROMOTIONS WITH 1 WIN AND 1 LOSE AND I JUST WON A GAME BUT WTH WHY AM I STILL SILVER 5 IM SUPPOSED TO BE SILVER 4 AND I WAS ON PROMOTIONS WHAT HAPPENED!?!?!?!?!??!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!!?!?!?

replies.body:
Based on what I'm seeing while looking at your account, it seems you queue dodged during your promos, which counts as a loss as *Lew* mentioned. 

If you'd like any other info on Queue Dodging, check out [our FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging). Let me know if you have any questions.
ohh okay thank you... well i accidentally didnt click it but thats my fault :/ thanks for letting me know :D
Did you happen to dodge a game while you were in the series?  A dodge will automatically count as a loss.
